Misty

> Sorry=
 had dead modem and had to wait for cable company to
> bring out a new one,=
 took em 3 weeks!
> =A0
> So I did a some sessions while I waited, got some=
 good
> responses and actually a few EVPs saying my name and that
> mom lov=
es you....checked my mail when I got my net back and
> got an email from th=
e lady(Pat) that lived next door to my
> mom and whom was a good friend of =
my mom.=A0 Theres a new
> family living on my moms property now, new mobile=
 home and
> all...well they have a 3 year old son who talked to my moms
> f=
riend a week or so ago...the little boy was telling her
> about talking to =
a "man with ugly eyes" in his
> room and how he was nice, he wasnt mean, Pa=
t thinks(and I
> tend to agree)=A0that the boy was talking to my mom...my m=
om
> had realllllly short hair and didnt have pretty eyes, she
> had almost=
 manly features as she got older and it would be
> easy for a 3 year old to=
 think she was male, specially at
> night in a semi dark room.=A0 The boy d=
idnt say what they
> talked about, but they had a conversation and he wasnt=

> scared...this happened on the day I got the EVPs in
> my session.=A0 I w=
anna get a digi recorder now and see if
> they would allow me to do a sessi=
on at their place...would
> be very interesting to see what kind of respons=
es Id get if
> I were on her property compared to sitting in my place which=

> is 20 miles or so away.
> =A0

ya'll.=A0 Hope
> everyone is having a good week so far!=A0

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;">Thanks Misty, its good to be back!<BR><BR>--- On <B>Thu, 8/21/08, Misty Dawn <I><bulletbabea@...></I></B> wrote:<BR>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...><BR>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Did ya miss me!?<BR>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Thursday, August 21, 2008, 9:56 AM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv1593089566>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<DIV>Welcome back Rhonda!<BR><BR>Glad ya found time to get some recording in while you were away.<BR><BR>Misty<BR><BR>--- On Thu, 8/21/08, Rhonda W <<A href="mailto:rhondak1973%40yahoo.com" target=_blank rel=nofollow>rhondak1973@ yahoo.com</A>> wrote:<BR><BR>> From: Rhonda W <<A href="mailto:rhondak1973%40yahoo.com" target=_blank rel=nofollow>rhondak1973@ yahoo.com</A>><BR>> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Did ya miss me!?<BR>> To: <A href="mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com" target=_blank rel=nofollow>EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com</A><BR>> Date: Thursday, August 21, 2008, 12:38 PM<BR>> Im bacccccccck!<BR>>  <BR>> Sorry had dead modem and had to wait for cable company to<BR>> bring out a new one, took em 3 weeks!<BR>>  <BR>> So I did a some sessions while I waited, got some good<BR>> responses and actually a few EVPs saying my name and that<BR>> mom loves you....checked my mail when I got my net back and<BR>> got
 an email from the lady(Pat) that lived next door to my<BR>> mom and whom was a good friend of my mom.  Theres a new<BR>> family living on my moms property now, new mobile home and<BR>> all...well they have a 3 year old son who talked to my moms<BR>> friend a week or so ago...the little boy was telling her<BR>> about talking to a "man with ugly eyes" in his<BR>> room and how he was nice, he wasnt mean, Pat thinks(and I<BR>> tend to agree) that the boy was talking to my mom...my mom<BR>> had realllllly short hair and didnt have pretty eyes, she<BR>> had almost manly features as she got older and it would be<BR>> easy for a 3 year old to think she was male, specially at<BR>> night in a semi dark room.  The boy didnt say what they<BR>> talked about, but they had a conversation and he wasnt<BR>> scared...this happened on the day I got the EVPs in<BR>> my session.  I wanna get a digi recorder now
 and see if<BR>> they would allow me to do a session at their place...would<BR>> be very interesting to see what kind of responses Id get if<BR>> I were on her property compared to sitting in my place which<BR>> is 20 miles or so away.<BR>>  <BR>> Anyways, just wanted to share that with ya'll.  Hope<BR>> everyone is having a good week so far!  <BR>>  <BR>> Rhonda<BR><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
